body: I feel sad and happy. Sad because the innocent Harumi is no more. Happy because those bitches got their lovers taken from them by the woman they hate albeit unintentionally.
Semi happy ending seem like fantasy , u know how our and shindol work are almost similar , maybe 3 out 10 .

@Lukasblade He started with tons of them, vanilla-ish works about happy people with a gimmick that made them interesting to draw or right (scars and missing limbs, insatiably lusty gals in a critical Japan, and so forth). He's always mixed them with some darker works, but then Emergence happened and I doubt you can erase the time and thought you spend crafting a text like that.
Why doesn't ShindoL do any works with semi happy endings like this?
